swapApproval.description: Used in the transaction display list to describe a transaction that is an approve call on a token that is to be swapped.. $1 is the symbol of a token that has been approved.

swapApproveNeedMoreTokens.description: Tells the user how many more of a given token they need for a specific swap. $1 is an amount of tokens and $2 is the token symbol.

swapBuildQuotePlaceHolderText.description: Tells the user that a given search string does not match any tokens in our token lists. $1 can be any string of text

swapCheckingQuote.description: Shown to the user during quote loading. $1 is the name of an aggregator. The message indicates that Bodhi Wallet is currently checking if that aggregator has a trade/quote for their requested swap.

swapEnableDescription.description: Gives the user info about the required approval transaction for swaps. $1 will be the symbol of a token being approved for swaps.
swapEnableDescription.message: 这是必需的，并授予菩提钱包交易 $1 的权限。

swapEstimatedNetworkFeeSummary.description: $1 will be the translation of swapEstimatedNetworkFee, with the font bolded
swapEstimatedNetworkFeeSummary.message: “$1” 是我们预估的实际费用。具体费用取决于实际情况。

swapEstimatedNetworkFeesInfo.message: 这是用于完成交易的交易费用的估计。实际数量可能会根据网络状况而变化。

swapEstimatedTimeFull.description: This message shows bolded swapEstimatedTime message, which is substited for $1, followed by either the estimated remaining transaction time in mm:ss, or the swapEstimatedTimeCalculating message, which are substituted for $2.

swapFailedErrorDescription.message: 你的资金安全无虞，仍然可以在钱包中使用。

swapFetchingQuotesErrorDescription.message: 嗯...出了点问题。 请重试，或者如果错误仍然存在，请联系客户支持。

swapHighSlippageWarning.message: 价格浮动非常大。确保你知道自己在做什么！

swapIntroLearnMoreLink.message: 了解有关菩提交易所的更多信息

swapIntroPopupSubTitle.message: 你现在可以直接在菩提钱包中交易代币。菩提钱包聚合交易结合了多个去中心化交易所集合商，专业做市商和单个去中心化交易所，以确保菩提钱包用户始终以最低的交易费用获得最优的价格。

swapLearnMoreContractsAuditReview.message: 查看我们的正式合约审核

swapLowSlippageError.message: 交易可能失败，最大价格浮动率过低。

swapMaxNetworkFeeInfo.description: $1 will be the translation of swapMaxNetworkFees, with the font bolded
swapMaxNetworkFeeInfo.message: “$1” 是你最多会支付的数量。当网络拥堵时，它可能会很大。

swapMetaMaskFeeDescription.description: Provides information about the fee that Bodhi Wallet takes for swaps. $1 is a decimal number.
swapMetaMaskFeeDescription.message: 我们每次都会从头部流动性资金池中找到最优的价格。每个报价都会自动计入 $1% 的费用，这支持进行中的开发以使菩提钱包更好。

swapNQuotes.description: $1 is the number of quotes that the user can select from when opening the list of quotes on the 'view quote' screen

swapNetworkFeeSummary.message: 交易费用包括处理你的交易并将其存储在以太坊网络上的成本。菩提钱包无法从此费用中获利。

swapNewQuoteIn.description: Tells the user the amount of time until the currently displayed quotes are update. $1 is a time that is counting down from 1:00 to 0:00

swapOnceTransactionHasProcess.description: This message communicates the token that is being transferred. It is shown on the awaiting swap screen. The $1 will be a token symbol.
swapOnceTransactionHasProcess.message: 交易完成后，你的 $1 将会添加到你的帐户中。

swapQuoteDetailsSlippageInfo.message: 如果价格在你下订单和确认订单之间改变，称为“价格浮动率”。 如果价格浮动超过你的 "最大价格浮动率" 设置，则交易将自动取消。

swapQuoteIncludesRate.description: Provides information about the fee that Bodhi Wallet takes for swaps. $1 is a decimal number.
swapQuoteIncludesRate.message: 交易价格包含 $1% 矿工费用

swapQuoteNofN.description: A count of loaded quotes shown to the user while they are waiting for quotes to be fetched. $1 is the number of quotes already loaded, and $2 is the total number of quotes to load.

swapQuotesAreRefreshed.message: 经常刷新交易价格以反映当前的市场行情。

swapQuotesExpiredErrorDescription.message: 请刷新以获取最新价格。

swapQuotesNotAvailableErrorDescription.message: 尝试调整数量或价格浮动率设置，然后重试。

swapReceivingInfoTooltip.message: 这是一个估计。 确切的数量取决于价格浮动率。

swapSaving.description: Tells the user their average savings for the selected best quote. $1 is replaced by a tilde sign, to shown approximation. $2 is replaced by the approximate amount of money the user will save, in fiat

swapSelectQuotePopoverDescription.message: 以下是从多种流动性来源收集的所有交易价格。

swapSlippageTooLow.message: 价格浮动率必须大于零

swapSourceInfo.message: 我们搜索多种流动性来源（交易所，集合商和专业做市商），以找到最佳兑换率和最低交易费用。

swapTokenAvailable.description: This message is shown after a swap is successful and communicates the exact amount of tokens the user has received for a swap. The $1 is a decimal number of tokens followed by the token symbol.
swapTokenAvailable.message: 你的 $1 已添加到你的帐户中。

swapTokenToToken.description: Used in the transaction display list to describe a swap. $1 and $2 are the symbols of tokens in involved in a swap.

swapVerifyTokenExplanation.message: 多个代币可以使用相同的名称和符号。检查Etherscan区块链浏览器以确认这是你要查找的代币。

swapYourTokenBalance.description: Tells the user how much of a token they have in their balance. $1 is a decimal number amount of tokens, and $2 is a token symbol

swapsNotEnoughForTx.description: Tells the user that they don't have enough of a token for a proposed swap. $1 is a token symbol

syncWithMobile.message: 使用移动设备进行同步

syncWithMobileBeCareful.message: 扫描编码时，请确保身边无其他人正在查看你的显示页面

syncWithMobileComplete.message: 你的数据已同步成功。尽情体验菩提钱包应用程序！

syncWithMobileDesc.message: 你可以使用个人移动设备同步个人账户与信息。打开菩提钱包移动应用程序，进入“设置”选项，点击“通过浏览器扩展程序同步”

syncWithMobileDescNewUsers.message: 如果你是首次启用菩提钱包移动应用程序，请通过个人手机完成如下操作。

syncWithMobileScanThisCode.message: 使用菩提钱包应用程序扫描编码

syncWithMobileTitle.message: 使用移动设备进行同步

syncWithThreeBoxDescription.message: 打开以使用3Box备份你的设置。此功能目前处于测试阶段；使用风险自负。

syncWithThreeBoxDisabled.message: 3Box已由于初始同步期间的错误而被禁用

thisWillCreate.message: 该操作将为你创建新钱包和助记词

toAddress.description: $1 is the address to include in the To label. It is typically shortened first using shortenAddress

transactionCancelAttempted.message: 在 $2 尝试取消交易，其交易费Gas费为 $1

transactionCancelSuccess.message: 成功在 $2 取消交易单

transactionCreated.message: 在 $2 生成的交易单，其交易额为 $1 。

transactionError.message: 交易出错. 合约代码执行异常.

transactionErrorNoContract.message: 正在尝试调用非联系人地址功能。

transactionResubmitted.message: 在 $2 重新提交的交易单，其交易费Gas费增加至 $1

transactionSubmitted.message: 在 $2 提交的交易单，其交易费Gas费为 $1 。

troubleConnectingToWallet.description: $1 is the wallet device name; $2 is a link to wallet connection guide
troubleConnectingToWallet.message: 我们在连接到你的 $1 时遇到问题，请尝试查看 $2 ，然后重试。

troubleTokenBalances.description: Followed by a link (here) to view token balances
troubleTokenBalances.message: 我们无法加载你的代币余额。你可以查看它们

trustSiteApprovePermission.description: $1 is the url requesting permission and $2 is the symbol of the currency that the request is for
trustSiteApprovePermission.message: 你信任这个网站吗？授予此权限，即表示你允许 $1 有权处置你授权数量的 $2 并自动执行交易。

unknownCameraError.message: 尝试获取相机使用权限时报错。请重试…

unknownQrCode.message: 错误：我们无法识别该二维码

urlExistsErrorMsg.message: 网址已存在于现有网络列表中

usePhishingDetection.message: 使用钓鱼网址检测系统

usePhishingDetectionDescription.message: 显示针对以太坊用户的网络钓鱼网址的警告

usedByClients.message: 可用于各种不同的客户端

verifyThisTokenOn.description: Points the user to etherscan as a place they can verify information about a token. $1 is replaced with the translation for "etherscan"

viewOnEtherscan.message: 在区块链浏览器上查看

walletConnectionGuide.message: 我们的硬件钱包连接指南

welcome.message: 欢迎使用菩提钱包插件钱包

writePhrase.message: 请将该助记词记录在纸上，并保存在安全的地方。如果希望提升信息安全性，请将信息记录在多张纸上，并分别保存在 2 - 3 个不同的地方。

xOfY.description: $1 and $2 are intended to be two numbers, where $2 is a total, and $1 is a count towards that total

youNeedToAllowCameraAccess.message: 你需要开启相机访问权限，才能使用该功能。
